defeating any monsters within the walls.

If these attacks keep coming, then…)

Someone's coming forward from the enemy line."
CREATECG|前景|グラフィック\ビジュアル\一枚絵\一枚絵敵の大軍.gal|NORMAL|#1|C|C|1000|||||
CREATECG|敵|グラフィック\NPC\モンスター\特殊\女悪魔縮小.gal|NORMAL|#1|C|50|1010|||||
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
like dragging out this pointless fight?"
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
A servant of the King of Darkness, Baalveil."
"Everyone, isn't it in your best interest to stop fighting?
The King of Darkness is a generous ruler. I'm sure he will
give you mercy in exchange for your surrender."
"Keep it coming, we'll drive you off as many times as it takes!"
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
But really, you're wasting your breath.
Here, this should help you understand. Take a look."
CREATECG|前景|グラフィック\ビジュアル\H画像\44エルザ磔01.gal|NORMAL|#1|C|C|1000|||||
From the enemy ranks, monsters came forward bearing large
wooden stakes, with human beings bound to them.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
Upon these great wooden beams, countless women were
crucified. They were captives from towns and villages
ravaged by the demon army, including nuns from the monastery.
Their faces twisted in despair as the demons gathered around them.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","モブ\201◆◆女A.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","モブ\201◆◆女B.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
The women, exposed to all the soldiers atop the walls,
[\x01]CHANGECG|前景|グラフィック\ビジュアル\H画像\44エルザ磔02.gal|NORMAL|1|400|0|0||1
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","102◆◆◆エルザ.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"So you see, when these girls become pregnant,
their demonic offspring can be made to grow
very quickly through the power of magic."
"Within a month, they will be able to
"No matter how well you resist, your manpower
will inevitably fall over time due to casualties.
Meanwhile, we can replenish our numbers immediately.
Don't you understand what this means?"
Regardless of her biting words, it wasn't the fiend's logic
that bothered the soldiers, but the screams of the women.
[\x01]CREATECG|白フラッシュ|グラフィック\エフェクト\白フラッシュ0020秒.lmt|SCRAP|#1|C|B|1200|1|0|0|0||1
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","102◆◆◆エルザ.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
A monstrous cock stabbed into her womb, releasing
more than enough sperm to fertilize her egg.
Even though the soliders were at a distance, they could
see the thick, white liquid dripping between her legs.
The women were humiliated to be exposed like this,
for their pleas and screams to be heard by all.
But even more humiliating was the occasional cry of pleasure.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","102◆◆◆エルザ.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
[\x01]CHANGECG|前景|グラフィック\ビジュアル\H画像\44エルザ磔03.gal|NORMAL|14|400|0|0||1
Their bodies were constantly loaded with drugs designed
to ensure pregnancy, and make even rape feel pleasurable.
With milk spewing from their breasts, the women went mad.
As one demon finished raping them, another took his place…
The crucified women were tortured for hours under the sun.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"If you want it to stop, why don't you come out
here and save them? Just open the gate…"
"She's trying to provoke us into opening the gate.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Hey, if you won't give in, that's fine, too.
I can keep torturing these girls in front of you…
…And make your wives and daughters like this, too!
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Although, if you grant this one simple request of mine,
I could let them go. Perhaps I'll even allow a ceasefire…"
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"In the Palas monastery, there lived a certain shrine maiden
whose job it was to call the Spirit for help in case
of danger. This was humanity's last fleeting hope."
"But after we raided the monastery, we found out that
this Sacrifical Princess had run away. She abandoned her
duty, and selfishly left everyone else to their fates…"
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","503◆◆◆妖魔メニケー.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"The King of Darkness wants the Sacrificial Princess…
That's why we've attacked this city. If you give
her to us, he will surely have mercy on you."
"――Listen up, humans! If you want to save your
pitiful lives, find Feena, the Sacrificial Princess!
Capture her, and bring her to me!"
"If we give her to that fiend, we can save them?"
"They're attacking the city, just to find her…?"
"Cut the chatter! Don't lend this demon your ear!
This is just a trick by the enemy!"

through the city like wildfire, bringing turmoil
